issue.title: Tests assume undefined $TMPDIR to run correctly

content.raw:
Well, this is pretty much the design, we want temporary files to be created in a subdirectory of the previously defined `TMPDIR` rather than an arbitrary location like `/tmp`.

It looks like it only causes problems here because `TMPDIR` is somewhere accessible on the submission host but not on the execution host. Is that right?
